Name: Sim Credits
AttributesDescription: Simulated Shell Credits composed of Remnant data, used to craft Combat Machines in "Tidal Defense Simulator" or purchase materials from KU-Money's Store.
BgDescription: These Shell-Credit-based currencies are used to represent the logistics budget earned during combat, including but not limited to supplies, manpower, Echo data, energy, and any other resources measurable in monetary terms.
ObtainedShowDescription: Simulated Shell Credits composed of Remnant data, used to craft Combat Machines in "Tidal Defense Simulator" or purchase materials from KU-Money's Store.
